text: The Orang Asli Museum () is a place in Malaysia, in Gombak, Selangor. It shows the history and culture of the Orang Asli people. The museum has a library and a small theater. Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad opened it on September 29, 1987. Category:1987 establishments in Asia Category:1980s establishments in Malaysia Category:Museums in Malaysia Category:Selangor
title: Orang Asli Museum
